About.paragraph:
Pinwear grew out of my experiences as kid growing up in Jamaica. The safety pins I used there to repair clothes has now become the symbol of my fashion enterprise. Our running man logo represents where we've started and our enthusiasm to keep moving forward with our innovative athletic apparel.
Now based in NYC, we have designed a product line that exemplifies the highest quality in men's and women's activewear. All items are made from 100% organic cotton and pre-shrunk. With fabric that breathes and stays dry, you'll have nothing holding you back at the gym, basketball court, or track. Our line of men's and women's tshirts feature graphics that will make you stand out. Men's shorts and women's shorts and leggings are light and comfortable, great for any kind of workout.

Services.name: Store
Services.text: Step into style with our online store, where fashion meets convenience! Discover curated collections featuring the latest trends and timeless classics, all delivered straight to your doorstep for the ultimate shopping experience.

Services.name: YouTube
Services.text: Featured spotlights on emerging NYC artists, tips on how to stay fit, and fashion shows unveiling our latest designs

Services.name: Instagram
Services.text: Follow us for daily fashion inspiration and exclusive offers that will elevate your wardrobe to new heights!
